com.ash.util

Class DebugHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ash.util.DebugHelper

  • public class DebugHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides multiple functionality to debug objects and classes.

      Returns all non-static field-values and their values on the given object as string for debugging.

      Will replace %variableName% (case-sensitive) with the variable value directly from the object
      %%% will insert the given object .toString().

      static java.lang.String multiInsert(java.lang.String insertTo, java.lang.Object... getFrom)
      Will replace %variableName% (case-sensitive) with the variable value directly from the first of the given objects
      which contains a field with this name
      %%% will insert the first given object .toString().
